hero.title: A small society of experienced webmakers united by horror.
hero.lead: We craft stark, Puritan‑leaning websites (think The Witch) that respect readability and photosensitivity. We are not a crowdfunding platform or sponsors — we build the site that gets you watched, backed, or booked.
